mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(email, hashed, name) VALUES (#{request.email}, #{request.hashed}, #{request.name})
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.email, m.hashed, m.name, m.created_timestamp, count(f.follow_id) AS followed, count(f.member_id) AS following FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN follow f ON m.id = f.follow_id OR m.id = f.member_id WHERE m.email = #{email} GROUP BY m.id
